text: Archie Irvine (born 25 June 1946) is a Scottish footballer, who played for Airdrie, Sheffield Wednesday, Doncaster Rovers and Scunthorpe United. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from North Lanarkshire Category:Association football midfielders Category:Scottish footballers Category:Armadale Thistle F.C. players Category:Airdrieonians F.C. title: Archie Irvine
